goal.en: "The goal of this class is to establish the students' capability in using vector to describe physical quantities and laws. Students need to learn basic computations, and is able to apply the concept of vector to solve problems according to their purpose. Vector analysis is the basic class for future advanced courses in this department such as Mechanics, Electricity and Magnetism, Fluid Mechanics, as well as Atmospheric Dynamics."
goal.ch: 建立以向量描述自然界物理量的觀念，熟練向量運算，並能夠靈活應用各種定理。本課程為各位日後修習力學、電磁學、流體力學、大氣動力學等重要課程的基礎。

content.en:
教學大綱：
(1)basic laws in vector computation.
(2)Tensor notation。
(3)位置、速度(Velocity)、加速度(Acceleration)。
(4)曲率(Curvature)和扭率(Torsion)。
(5)梯度(Gradient)、輻合/輻散(Convergence/Divergence)、旋度(Curl)。
(6)線積分與面積分。
(7)格林定理(Green’s theorem)、位勢定理(Potential theory)。
(8)高斯輻合輻散定理 (Gauss theorem)、斯托克定理(Stokes’s theorem)。
(9)曲線(直角)座標系統(Curvilinear coordinates)。
教學目標：
 建立以向量描述自然界物理量的觀念。熟練向量的運算，並能夠靈活應用各種定理。本課程為各位日後修習力學、電磁學、流體力學、大氣動力學等重要課程的基礎。

(8)高斯輻合輻散定理 (Gauss theorem)、斯托克定理(Stokes’s theorem)。
(9)曲線(直角)座標系統(Curvilinear coordinates)。
